title: [Resolved] Help me please
body:
Hey guys i need a hand!

Whenever i log into league of legends my loading screen (when im about to play a game) doesn't cover the entire screen, i can still see the task bar on the bottom and League of Legends Tml at the top of the loading screen as well as the minimize and close buttons.

When im in game i can scroll up and sideways, but i cant scroll down

I have reinstalled League 3 times and it hasn't fixed it

If anyone has any suggestions please tell me 

Thanks 
Rain of Terror

replies.body: Can you go into your in-game graphics settings and check whether you're running in Full-Screen, Windowed, or Borderless?
OMG thank you very much i owe you one mate

> [{quoted}](name=Rain of Terror,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=csfqPfeT,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-23T10:42:17.563+0000)
>

Always a pleasure! (:
